price: 85. Nabii Yaq-qhuub xaylo : Yallal xiibitna immay atu Yuusuf kassittaamak makatta rookâ biyaakah raba xayyoysi hinnay rabe marih num tikki ittam fanah kaak iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَؤُاْ تَذۡكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوۡ تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡهَٰلِكِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi tafta-u tadhkuru yūsufa ḥattā takūna ḥaraḍan aw takūna mina al-hālikīna
